import React, { Fragment, useState } from 'react'; import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; import { connect } from 'react-redux'; const CreateProfile = props => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ website: '', bio: '', interests: '', youtube: '', twitter: '', facebook: '', linkeding: '', instagram: '' }); const [displaySocialInputs, toggleSocialInputs] = useState(false); const { website, bio, interests, youtube, twitter, facebook, linkeding, instagram } = formData; const onChange = e => setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); return (

onChange(e)} /> Could be your own or a company website
Please use comma separated values (eg. HTML, CSS, Photography, Music...)

); }; CreateProfile.propTypes = {}; export default CreateProfile;
